/* TITLE */
.qvra__title {
    margin-top: 3em;
    margin-bottom: 1em;
}

.fake_title {
    border-bottom: 0;
    color: #333;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 220%;
    line-height: 120%
}

#page-title {
    display: none
}
div#container-wrap {
    background: 0
}

.top-bar {
    display: none
}

.mobile-top-bar {
    display: block;
    right: 8px;
}
#header {
    margin: 0
}

#header,
#top-bar {
    width: 100vw;
    max-width: 100vw;
    right: 0
}

/* HEADER */

#header,
.mobile-top-bar {
    max-width: 100% !important
}

#header {

    border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;

#header h1 a {
    position:  absolute;
    padding: 0;
    top: 50%;
    left: 170px;
    font-size: 130% !important
    z-index: 11;
}

#header h1 a:after {

    color: #333;
    text-shadow: none;
    top: -2px;

/* LOGIN STATUS */

#login-status {
    color: black;
    filter: grayscale(100%) saturate(0%);
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) saturate(0%);
    top: 2px
}
 
#login-status a {
      color: black;
}
 
#login-status ul a {
      color: black;
}
 #account-topbutton{
      color: black;
      background: #ccc;
      font-size: 100%;
}

/* TOP BAR */

#top-bar {
    top: 66px
}

#top-bar ul li a {
    border-left: 0;
    border-right: 0;
    color: #787c7b;
    font-family: 'Kosugi Maru';
    font-size: 13px
}

#top-bar ul li a:hover {
    color: #000
}

#top-bar ul li.sfhover a,
#top-bar ul li:hover a {
    border-left: 0;
    border-right: 0
}

#top-bar ul li.sfhover a,
#top-bar ul li:hover a {
    background: #fff;
    color: #000
}

#top-bar ul li ul {
    border: 0;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 4px #ccc
}

#top-bar ul li.sfhover ul li a,
#top-bar ul li:hover ul li a {
    border-top: 0;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #787c7b
}

#top-bar ul li.sfhover ul li a:hover,
#top-bar ul li:hover ul li a:hover {
    background: #4a4a4a;
    color: #fff
}

#top-bar li:hover ul,
#top-bar li.sfhover ul {
    right: 0
}

#top-bar ul li a[href="javascript:;"]:hover {
    background: #2d8c3c;
    color: #fff;
    text-decoration: none;
    border: 2px solid #2d8c3c
}


/* SIDE BAR */

#side-bar {
    margin: 0;
    background: #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px #000
    top: 86px;
}

#side-bar .side-block {
    background: #fff !important;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
    border-radius: 0
}


@media(min-width:767px) {
    #content-wrap {
        position: static
    }
    #side-bar {
        top: 107px;
        position: absolute;
        height: 100%;
        left: 0
    }
}

@media(max-width:767px) {
    #side-bar {
        background-color: #9ce6a8 !important
    }
}

#side-bar div.menu-item img {
    filter: brightness(1.5)hue-rotate(120deg)
}

#side-bar .collapsible-block-folded,
#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded {
    filter: brightness(1.5)hue-rotate(120deg)
}

@media(max-width:767px) {
    .open-menu a {
        position: fixed;
        bottom: .5em;
        left: .5em;
        z-index: 15;
        font-family: san-serif;
        font-size: 30px;
        font-weight: 700;
        width: 30px;
        height: 30px;
        line-height: .9em;
        text-align: center;
        border: 2px solid #2d8c3c !important;
        background-color: #fff !important;
        border-radius: 3px;
        color: #2d8c3c !important;
        padding-top: 5px
    }
    .open-menu a:hover {
        text-decoration: none !important;
        -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 20px 3px #2d8c3c;
        -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 20px 3px #2d8c3c;
        -ms-box-shadow: 0 0 20px 3px #2d8c3c;
        -o-box-shadow: 0 0 20px 3px #2d8c3c;
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px 3px #2d8c3c
    }
}

#side-bar a,
#interwiki a {
     color:#333
}

/* RATE MODULE */
.page-rate-widget-box {
    font-family: FontAwesome;
}

.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a:before {
    content: "\f164";
    padding: 0 5px;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a:before {
    content: "\f165";
    padding: 0 5px;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a, .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a {
    color: transparent;
    font-size:0px;
    padding: 0px;
    height: 20px;
    border-radius:10px;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a:before , .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a:before {
    color: #21662b;
    font-size: 13px;
}

.page-rate-widget-box, .rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton {
    box-shadow: unset;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points {
    background: transparent !important;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup, .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown, .page-rate-widget-box .cancel, .page-rate-widget-box .cancel a {
    background: transparent;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points, .page-rate-widget-box .rateup, .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown, .page-rate-widget-box .cancel, .page-rate-widget-box .cancel a {
    border: unset;
    color: #21662b;
    margin: 1px;
}

.page-rate-widget-box .cancel a, .creditButton a {
    color: #21662b !important;
    background: transparent;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    display: inline-flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    padding: unset;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel a:before {
    content: '\f00d';
    font-size: 12px;
}

.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a:hover:before , .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a:hover:before, .page-rate-widget-box .cancel a:hover {
    background: #21662b;
    color: #fff !important;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a:hover, .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a:hover {
    background: #21662b;
}

.rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton {
    background-color: transparent !important;
    border: unset !important;
    color: #21662b;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    border-radius: 10px;
}
.rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton a:hover {
    background-color: #21662b !important;
    color: #fff !important;
}

a.fa.fa-info {
    color: #21662b !important;
}

/* FAKETAG */
#page-content .fake-tags span {
    max-width: 100%;
    font-family: Segoe UI4;
    border: unset;
}
#page-content .fake-tags a {
    color: #292929;
    font-size: 13px;
    padding: 5px;
    height: 20px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    text-decoration: unset;
}
#page-content .fake-tags a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}
#page-content .fake-tags a:before {
    content: '#';
}

/* HAEDING */
#page-content h1 {
    color: #333;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) 0, rgba(234, 234, 234, 1) 2em, rgba(234, 234, 234, 1) calc(100% - 2em), rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) 100%);
}

#u-qvra a {
color: inherit;
text-decoration: underline;
}
#u-qvra a:hover {
text-decoration: none;
}
.ruby {
    vertical-align: calc(1em - 0.4px);
}
blockquote {
    position: relative;
    padding: 10px 15px 10px 50px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-style: italic;
    border: solid 2px #DCDCDC;
    color: #333;
    background:#ffffff;
}
 
blockquote:before{
    display: inline-block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px;
    left: 15px;
    content: "\f10d";
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    color: #DCDCDC;
    font-size: 25px;
    line-height: 1;
    font-weight: 900;
}
 
blockquote p {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 10px 0;
    line-height: 1.7;
}
 
blockquote cite {
    display: block;
    text-align: right;
    color: #ffffff;
    font-size: 0.9em;
}

#page-content .details p{
  display: block;
  margin-top: auto;
  margin-bottom: 0em;
}
#page-content .details {
  float: right;
  clear: right;
  margin: 0.5em 0 0.5em 1em;
  padding: 0.2em;
  width: 320px;
  border: 1px solid #a2a9b1;
  background-color: #f8f9fa;
  color: black;
  text-align: left;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
#page-content .details a {
  color: #3366BB;
}
#page-content .details > .details-title-text{
  margin: 0 0 0 0.13em;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 1.5em;
}

#page-content .details hr{
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 1px;
  border: none;
  background-color: #a2a9b1;
  color: #a2a9b1;
}
#page-content .block{
  display: table;
  margin-left: auto;
  border: solid 1px #a2a9b1;
  background: #f8f9fa;
}
#page-content .block > .details-title{
  padding: 1px;
  background: #eee;
  text-align: center;
}
#page-content .block > .details-img{
  text-align: center;
}

.details-title {
  margin-top: 2px;
  margin-bottom: 2px;
  background-color: #ffbcd0;
  vertical-align: middle;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 110%;
}
.details-title-detail {
  margin-top: 2px;
  margin-bottom: 2px;
  background-color: #DCDCDC;
  vertical-align: middle;
  text-align: center;
}
.details-title-image {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #aaa;
  text-align: center;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
.detail-info {
  padding: 2px;
}

.footnotes-footer .title {
  font-size: 0;
  border-bottom: unset;
}
.footnotes-footer .title:before {
    content: unset;
}
h2{
  color: black;
  font-family: 'Noto Serif JP', serif;
  margin-top: 1em;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  margin-bottom: 0.25em;
}
.wikisize{
    font-size:118%;
    line-height: 1.6;
    clear: both;
}
.wikisize p,.wikisize li{
    line-height: 1.6;
}
.wikisize ul{
    margin: 0.3em 0 0 1.6em;
    padding: 0;
}
@media (max-width: 979px) and (min-width: 768px)
#page-content div, #page-content div table {
    clear: both;
}
#page-content div, #page-content div table {
    max-width: 100%;
}

[[/module]]
